from pandas import DataFrame #spreadsheet or grid or as a table (rows and columns)
   
data = [
    [6.1,5.8,5.7,5.7,5.8,5.6,5.5,5.3,5.2,5.2],
    [1500,1520,1525,1523,1515,1540,1545,1560,1555,1565]
]
  
df = DataFrame(data)
df = df.T
print(df)
df.plot()
source.3a180808:
data = {
    "quantities" : [ 12, 34, 56],
    "price_each" : [ 0.99, 1.11, 3.33]
}
# FEATURE ENGINEERING
q = data["quantities"]
p = data["price_each"]
e = []

for i in range(len(q)):
    quantity = q[i]
    price = p[i]
    e.append(quantity * price)
    
data["extend_price"] = e

print(data)
df = DataFrame(data)
print(df)
df.plot()
